description: We all know Babasaheb Ambedkar was the architect of our constitution, but not many know that he was an accomplished economist too: PM Modi — PMO India (@PMOIndia) December 29, 2015 Financial Inclusion is at the core of our focus. We want to create job-creators, not job-seekers: PM @narendramodi —…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
The spirit of enterprise & determination shown by Dalit entrepreneurs is remarkable. Met them at National Conference of Dalit Entrepreneurs.

Dr. Ambedkar was a distinguished economist. He had the foresight on how industrialisation would empower Dalits. http://nm-4.com/t37b
